name: Slideonline.com
tag_list: powerpoint, presentations, slides, ppt, business, corporate
overview:
Slideonline is a free online sharing service for PowerPoint presentations that enables any user to share .PPT files and documents online.

The online sharing service lets anyone with a registered account to upload PowerPoint presentation files and automatically are converted to slides which can be later embedded in a web page or shared in social networks.

Slideonline can be used by individual users but also for commercial purposes or educational institutions.
